text: Júlio Carlos Santiago "Ghito" Vernazza (September 23, 1928 - November 12, 2017) was a former Argentine footballer. He was a forward who played for Platense and River Plate until 1956, when he moved to Italy and signed for newly promoted Serie A club Palermo. He was born in Buenos Aires. In 1960/1961, Vernazza played for AC Milan, where he obtained a second place. In 1961/1962, he moved to Vicenza, where he played two seasons before retiring in 1963 at the age of 35. Vernazza died in Buenos Aires on November 12, 2017 at the age of 89.Santiago Vernazza: el adiós a una gloria de River y de Platense ==References== ==Other websites== *Argentine players in Italy at rsssf * Platense profile Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires
